author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-L'occitane International SA Says Group's 9-Mnth Net Sales Grew By 3.0 Pct At Constant Rates
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - L‘occitane International Sa:
* GROUP‘S 9-MNTH NET SALES GREW BY 3.0 PCT AT CONSTANT RATES AND -0.6 PCT AT REPORTED RATES
* 9-MONTH LIKE-FOR-LIKE BASIS SALES GREW BY 3.9 PCT AT CONSTANT RATES AND 0.3 PCT AT REPORTED RATES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
